backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing presale state, recording contributions, updating allocations, and exposing query methods for status and contributor data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking background‑music UI changes to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short summaries for all frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables and light/dark theme color tokens with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component composing presale sections with animated background and the background‑music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: Renders mute and volume controls only when music is playing using popover UI and audio state hooks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright info and a tracked caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributor data in a styled table with loading skeletons and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Shows the 24‑hour countdown timer values in neon‑styled boxes.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Displays the deposit address with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality and visual confirmation.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Displays the hero section with a featured image, animated title, tagline, and three key feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains the three-step presale contribution process and shows presale details using preset constants.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Fetches and displays presale progress, ICP stats, and an ended state badge using dynamic status data.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress bar, and deposit address into a unified status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Shows tokenomics information and a FAQ list using constants such as max supply and presale cap.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Manages background music playback, preferences, and audio element lifecycle with opt‑in handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Queries contributor data from the backend actor with periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Implements a 24‑hour countdown timer that updates every second and returns hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login, stored identities, and login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Uses react-query to poll the backend actor for current presale status at a fixed interval.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, theme variables, and custom neon-style animations and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query client and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Manages localStorage persistence for background music preferences and opt‑in status.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates raw contribution records by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers using German thousands separators with no decimal places.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including neon colors, custom radii, animations, and utility plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current high‑level requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and feature versioning metadata.
